results.title: 2024 World Battery & Energy Storage Industry Expo (WBE)
results.content: WBE will strive to break its own show size record again in 2024, expecting to occupy a total of 13 exhibition halls, amounting to 165,000 sq.m to bring together an estimated 2000+ premium exhibitors. Giving overseas buyers a first-hand and in-depth look at China's leading battery and battery equipment manufacturers, the highly recommended two ...
results.raw_content:
About | Contact| Advertise
User account menu
2024 World Battery & Energy Storage Industry Expo (WBE)
First launched in 2016, the show was originally named the Asia (Guangzhou) Battery Sourcing Fair (GBE ASIA) and has so far made 8 successful stagings in a row. Today, widely known as the World Battery & Energy Storage Industry Expo (WBE), it has become one of the biggest and most valued expo events of its kind on Chinese soil. Moreover, it has the biggest turnout of battery (cells and packs) and energy storage exhibitors in China, as well as the highest attendance of overseas buyers.
In 2024, WBE will strive to break its own show size record again, expecting to occupy a total of 13 exhibition halls, amounting to 165,000 sq.m to bring together an estimated 2000+ premium exhibitors. We look forward to the active participation of more overseas visitors!
Review of WBE 2023
Organized by Guangzhou Honest Exhibition Co., Ltd, the 8th World Battery & Energy Storage Industry Expo (WBE 2023) was successfully held this August 8th-10th at Area A, China Import and Export Fair Complex, Guangzhou.
Spanning over 100,000 sq.m, the show occupied a total of 8 exhibition halls, setting up 3957 booths, almost double from last year. 1205 exhibiting companies joined the show. The number of battery cells, packs and energy storage solutions exhibitors amounted to 476.
The bustling three days counted 137,500 visits in total, including overseas buyers from over 50 countries and regions, such as the USA, Germany, Korea, France, Japan, UK, Sweden, Belgium, Czech Republic, Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, India, Thailand, Brazil, South Africa.
China Battery Industry (Guangzhou) Summit, China Energy Storage Industry Ecology Conference, World Hydrogen Energy & Fuel Cell Industry Conference and the first-ever two-day factory tour program constituted the biggest highlights of WBE 2023.
Preview of WBE 2024
WBE will strive to break its own show size record again in 2024, expecting to occupy a total of 13 exhibition halls, amounting to 165,000 sq.m to bring together an estimated 2000+ premium exhibitors.
Giving overseas buyers a first-hand and in-depth look at China’s leading battery and battery equipment manufacturers, the highly recommended two-day factory tour program will make a grand comeback in 2024. We look forward to the active participation of more overseas visitors!
Live Events & Activities of WBE 2024
2024 China Battery Industry (Guangzhou) Summit
2024 China Energy Storage Industry Ecology Conference
2024 World Hydrogen Energy Industry Conference
2024 Two-Day Factory Tour Program
Exhibitor Profile
1) All kinds of Batteries, Battery pack & cell, BMS
2) Energy Storage Products
3) Battery Charging & Swapping products
4) Raw Material and Components for all kinds of batteries
5) Battery manufacturing equipment, testing equipment and instrument
6) Battery recycling and international logistics
7) Hydrogen energy and hydrogen energy application area
For more details visit our website (https://en.battery-expo.com/), you can also send your questions via Email to Ida_WBE3@163.com or Lokyee_wbe@163.com

results.title: Dongguan Golden CEL Battery Co., Ltd. - IFA Berlin 2023
results.content: Hall: 15 Stand: 160 | IFA Global Markets CEL Group was founded in 1999, is a large - scale Lithium Ion battery high-tech enterprise, engaged in R&D, production and sales. The main products are Li-polymer, NCM cylindrical, NI-MH and LFP battery.
results.raw_content:
​​​​​​​
​​​​​​​
Exhibitors
Dongguan Golden CEL Battery Co., Ltd.
CEL Group was founded in 1999, is a large - scale Lithium Ion battery high-tech enterprise, engaged in R&D, production and sales. The main products are Li-polymer, NCM cylindrical, NI-MH and LFP battery.
It is has three production bases located in DongGuan, JiangSu and AnHui province, total area of 20,000 square metes, 2,000 employees. We have the first-class production equipment, advanced production processes, strict quality requirements, and an efficient service team, which can provide customers with a comprehensive range of intelligent battery manufacturing services. Our products have passed multiple professional certifications, such as UL, CE, KC, BS, Rohs to satisfied the different clients different needs.
Through the constant efforts, CELL Battery has a good reputation in China. Its products are exported to Southeast Asia, Europe and the United States, and have been recognized by more than 3000 enterprise users.
